name: OrderID
description: The unique sales order or shipment number.

name: Alternate ID
description: An alternate or external order identifier.

name: Team ID
description: The ID of the team assigned to this order (e.g., 101).

name: Scan ID
description: A scannable identifier for the order.

name: Type
description: The type of task, e.g., DROP for delivery, PICKUP for collection.

name: Priority
description: The priority level of the order.

name: Skills
description: Required skills for the task.

name: Category
description: A category for the order.

name: Order Date
description: The date the order was placed, format YYYY-MM-DD.

name: Homebase ID
description: The starting location ID for the delivery team.

name: Homebase Execution Date
description: The date for execution from the homebase.

name: Homebase Slot Start
description: Start time for the homebase slot.

name: Homebase Slot End
description: End time for the homebase slot.

name: Homebase Transaction Duration (minutes)
description: Time in minutes for the homebase transaction.

name: Location ID
description: Our internal, unique ID for the customer's delivery location.

name: Customer Execution Date
description: The promised delivery date to the customer.

name: Customer Slot Start
description: Start time of the customer delivery window.

name: Customer Slot End
description: End time of the customer delivery window.

name: Customer Transaction Duration (minutes)
description: Time in minutes for the customer transaction.

name: Location Tag
description: Tags associated with the location.

name: Customer Place Name
description: The name of the customer's location (e.g., Carrefour C4).

name: Customer Address
description: The customer's street address.

name: Customer Locality
description: The customer's neighborhood or locality.

name: Customer City
description: The customer's city.

name: Customer State
description: The customer's state or governorate.

name: Customer Country
description: The customer's country.

name: Customer Zipcode
description: The customer's postal code.

name: Customer Location Latitude
description: Latitude of the delivery location.

name: Customer Location Longitude
description: Longitude of the delivery location.

name: Contact Name
description: Name of the contact person at the location.

name: Contact Number
description: Primary contact number.

name: Contact Alternate Number
description: Secondary contact number.

name: Contact Email
description: Contact email address.

name: Sku
description: Stock Keeping Unit

name: Sku Line Item ID
description: A unique ID for this specific line item in the order.

name: Sku Detail
description: Additional details about the SKU.

name: Payment Type
description: The method of payment.

name: Amount
description: The monetary value of the line item.

name: Currency
description: The currency of the amount.

name: Notes
description: Any notes related to the order line.

name: Volume
description: The volume of the line item.

name: Volume Unit
description: The unit of volume (e.g., m3).

name: Quantity
description: The number of units for this specific SKU.

name: Quantity Unit
description: The unit of measure for the quantity (e.g., PC, CASE).

name: Weight
description: The weight of the line item.

name: Weight Unit
description: The unit of weight (e.g., kg).

name: Rider Id
description: The ID of the assigned rider.

name: CUS:Company Owner
description: A custom field identifying the business entity (e.g., Elano Water).
